package step4;

//注意文件名，这里应该写MyThread类
/***begin your code here***/

public class MyThread extends Thread {
	public int num;
	public MyThread(int num) {
		this.num=num;
   
	}
	public void run(){
          try {
			Thread.sleep(3000);
		} catch (InterruptedException e) {
			// TODO Auto-generated catch block
			e.printStackTrace();
		}
		int result = 1;
		for(int i=1;i<=num;i++)
        {
            result=result*i;
        }
    	System.out.println(result);
	}
}

/***end your code***/
